name: Impossible square dash
description:
How far can you run, how far can you survive. Impossible square dash is a survival runner game where you have to dodge obstacles to survive.

FEATURES:

easy  gameplay

challenging levels

lots of fun

sorry about the buttons on the screen, it was supposed to be uploaded for android but changed my mind and uploaded it for windows and macOS..

enjoy

Buttons

Rshift key = start the game

p key = pause menu

Space key pressed = jump 

enter key = click on the pause buttons

PAUSE BUTTON

Green button = resume game

Blue button = restart game 

Red button = Exit game

 Enjoy...........
